title: Is backbiting ok for the purpose of marriage? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
someone comes to you and says this brother 
wants to marry my sister and you know he's a   drug addict and that he drinks alcohol he doesn't 
pray it's Ma shaa Allah he's the best of Brothers   you have betrayed him and this is sinful and 
Allah who will hold you accountable to it and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford 
it that's good for you if you cannot you're   entitled for one free session and this is for 
everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they   cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give 
them one free session without a problem a full   half an hour so come to me and let's speak 
about it inshallah within the following two   days or three days I will try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
